snippet: For 2017, the S.U.V. gets new wheels and fresh fascias front and rear. The interior’s center stack and many under-hood components are new, too....
abstract: Driven column review of 2017 Hyundai Santa Fe Limited Ultimate SUV.
lead_paragraph: For 2017, the S.U.V. gets new wheels and fresh fascias front and rear. The interior’s center stack and many under-hood components are new, too.

headline.print_headline: Comfort and Value in an S.U.V.,  With Seats to Spare
headline.main: Video Review: Hyundai Santa Fe’s Updates Deserve a Look
